answers.answer: Don't feel guilty! Feel guilty if you decided not to get induced because then you'd be harming the baby. I'm all up for induction if it is needed!!! Not if there is no reason too but you have a good reason to be induced! Always be safe rather than sorry

I agree ^^^ you have an good reason to get induced. Its whats best for you and ypu baby girl and all we want is for our babies to be healthy. Dnt feel guilty, it is for the best of mommy and baby. Good luck.

I agree with the others.  High blood pressure and low fluid can be dangerous for the baby!  I feel guilty when I eat anything with sugar..... even fruit!  Because I got 135 on the one hour glucose and they labeled me gestational diabetic.   The cuties are coming and we will all be overjoyed soon!  A happy safe and speedy time in delivery for you!!!! ♡☆♡☆♡

Thank you ladies so much all of you! You have made me feel so much better. I just was hoping she could come on her own but it is what's best. I truly appreciate all of your responses. God bless you ladies and your babies! I wish a healthy baby for all of us and healthy mamas too (:

Im not be induce yet but im gonna be 40 weeks this week and I had to go to the wEr for the same...low fluid a nst and for my preeclampsia. My doctor has me on bed rest also but I see him tomorrow. My due date is Wednesday so idk what is gonna happen. Im not even dilated yet.
Wow so stressful! I will keep you and your baby in my prayers. Best of luck to you and your baby. God bless

question: Went to my doctors appt. on Tuesday and my blood pressure was high again plus I am so swollen! So my doctor sent me to hospital to be monitored and to do a stress test for baby girl and my blood pressure went down but thats because I was laying down. All my test came back normal. Baby girl passed the stress test. I was released but put on bed rest. Had to go see him on Thursday and he's going to induce me next week on the 11th. I'm not due until the 18th. It's a week early but I feel so guilty for having to get induced. I know baby isn't ready to come because if she was she'd be here. I know he's doing it for the best but I can't help but feel bad. Plus my fluid isn't the best. Anyone else having to get induced and feeling guilty?
title: Feeling Guilty
